name: CoLab
long_description: CoLab is on a mission to accelerate the pace of innovation by helping engineering teams deliver better products faster. CoLabâ€™s Design Engagement System (DES) enables engineering teams to have more effective design conversations, design reviews and ultimately make better engineering decisions. CoLab launched AutoReview in 2025 - an AI peer checker that marks up 2D and 3D files. CoLab is trusted by Fortune 500 organizations like Ford, Komatsu, Johnson Controls, GE Appliances and Lockheed Martin.
one_liner: Human and AI design review for hardware
